title: Rio Ferdinand surprised Kate Wright with live performance from Ashanti at their wedding

Rio Ferdinand left no detail forgotten when he married Kate Wright.

The retired footballer, 40, ensured his bride, 27, had a night to remember as they partied after becoming man and wife by arranging a live performance from R&B hitmaker Ashanti.

Giving their guests who had all travelled out to Turkey for the lavish ceremony and reception a treat, Rio hired the music icon to sing at the after party.

Sharing the moment with her Instagram followers, 12 days after their nuptials, reality TV star Kate uploaded a clip of her and Rio dancing next to Ashanti as she took to the mic at their private party.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned the footage: "When u think the day couldn’t get any better and your husband surprises you with @ashanti .... wow."

Statuesque Rio stood behind Kate in the video as they moved to the music in a state of marital bliss next to Ashanti with was dressed in a black dress.

Kate flaunted her killer abs in a white crop top and maxi skirt that clung to her hips after changing out of her wedding gown.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The post comes after the former TOWIE star shared her favourite moment from her big day on social media.

The blushing bride revealed she cherished the moment she sashayed down the impressive water aisle towards her love Rio .

In the astonishing snap, the former TOWIE bombshell could be seen floating down the aisle flanked by Rio's sons Lorenz, 13, and Tate, 11.

(Image: Instagram)

The dad-of-three could be seen looking on with love at his bride as she made her way towards him.

Rio stood under the amazing arch which had a mirrored structure and white flowers were cascading down over the frame.

She wrote: "There were so many special moments at our wedding... But this is one I will never forget."

Kate added the hashtags "proud" and "myboys" to the Instagram post.
description: The newlyweds' post-ceremony bash was headlined by R&B sensation Ashanti
